scripts.build: ng build --prod -op dist2 && rm -rf dist && mv dist2 dist && npm run css
scripts.build:start: ng build --prod -op dist2 && rm -rf dist && mv dist2 dist && npm run css && npm start
scripts.css2: node-sass --output-style expanded public/static/sass/style-new.scss public/static/css/style-new.css  --source-map public/static/css/style-new.css.map && postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'latest 2 versions' -o public/static/css/style-new.min.css < public/static/css/style-new.css && cleancss public/static/css/style-new.css -o public/static/css/style-new.min.css
scripts.csswatch: node-sass --watch --output-style expanded public/static/sass/style-new.scss public/static/css/style-new.css  --source-map public/static/css/style-new.css.map && postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'latest 2 versions' -o public/static/css/style-new.min.css < public/static/css/style-new.css && cleancss public/static/css/style-new.css -o public/static/css/style-new.min.css
scripts.ssr: npm run build:universal && npm run server
scripts.ssr:debug: ng build --aot=true --output-hashing=all --named-chunks=false --build-optimizer=true  && ng run web-app:server:dev && webpack && node server.js
scripts.build:prerender: npm run build:universal && npm run generate:prerender
scripts.build:universal: ng build --prod && ng run web-app:server:production && webpack --progress --colors
